projects.title: Tokachi Musubi
projects.description: I recently launched a website for a friend's food truck, beautifully crafted to display seamlessly across devices such as iPhones, iPads, and Macs. Key features include: An adaptive design for optimal viewing on various screen sizes, menus and a schedule showcasing the food truck's culinary adventures, detailed insights into our special Tokachi and Musubi offerings, and a user-friendly interface for menu management that empowers the owner to make updates without any coding (only visible to the owner).
